articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Europe's space program plays catch-up with China and India - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Lack of funds and unity stall progress, but region still leads in Earth observation
articles.content: BRUSSELS -- Europe's intention to launch a return cargo mission to the International Space Station by 2028 puts it years behind China and India, with industry experts saying that unless there is grea… [+430 chars]

articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: 1st Nation To Establish Lunar Base, US Says China Could ‘Outpace’ NASA In Race To Moon - EurAsian Times
articles.description: US intelligence has publicly expressed apprehensions about China potentially outpacing the United States in the race to send humans back to the moon and establish a lunar outpost, according to reports. Washington and Beijing are actively competing for an edge…
